fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Level up a Discordian at night.
> Inform a non-Discordian they have leveled up at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If you level up a Discordian, choose a buff to give them. The buff only lasts for 1 night.
> If you inform a non-Discordian they leveled up, every feedback message will be replaced with “[Target] has leveled up!” If they received no feedback message, they will still be told they leveled up.
> Since Tatsu is not a player and therefore cannot die, if the player you are targeting dies, you will gain your “Player dying” buff.
List of buffs:
> Your target’s visit is astral.
> Choose a role for the target to appear as to all investigative abilities.
> Redirect your target’s visitors to another target.
> Your target will learn the role of whoever they target.
